ij.blob

Class Blob

  • java.lang.Object
    • ij.blob.Blob

  • public class Blob
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a connected component - a so called "blob".

        Evaluates the Custom Feature and return its value
        Parameters:

      • draw

        public void draw(ImageProcessor ip,
        int options)
        Draws the Blob with or without its holes.
        Parameters:
        ip - The ImageProcesser in which the blob has to be drawn.
        options - Drawing Options are DRAW_HOLES, DRAW_CONVEX_HULL, DRAW_LABEL. Combinations with | are possible.

      • draw

        public void draw(ImageProcessor ip)
        Draws the Blob with its holes.
        Parameters:
        ip - The ImageProcesser in which the blob has to be drawn.

      • getCenterOfGravity

        public java.awt.Point getCenterOfGravity()
        Return the geometric center of gravity of the blob. It is calculated by the outer contour without consider possible holes.
        Returns:
        Geometric center of gravity of the blob

      • getFeretDiameter

        public double getFeretDiameter()
        Calculates the feret diameter of the outer contour using its chain code
        Returns:
        The feret diameter of the outer contour.

      • getMoment

        public double getMoment(int p,
               int q)
        Region-Based Moments Definition of "Gorman et. al. Practical Algorithms for Image Analysis" (p. 157). (computational expensive!)
        Parameters:
        q - (order = (p + q))
        p - (order = (p + q))
        Returns:
        Region-Based Moments of order (p + q)

      • getCentralMoments

        public double getCentralMoments(int p,
                       int q)
        Central Moments Definition of "Gorman et. al. Practical Algorithms for Image Analysis" (p. 158). (computational expensive!)
        Parameters:
        q - (order = (p + q))
        p - (order = (p + q))
        Returns:
        Central Moment of Order (p + q)

      • getOrientationMajorAxis

        public double getOrientationMajorAxis()
        Returns:
        The Orientation of the Major Axis from the Blob in grad (measured counter clockwise from the positive x axis).

      • getOrientationMinorAxis

        public double getOrientationMinorAxis()
        Returns:
        The Orientation of the Major Axis from the Blob in grad (measured counter clockwise from the positive x axis).

      • getEigenvalueMajorAxis

        public double getEigenvalueMajorAxis()
        Calculates Eigenvalue from the major axis using the moments of the boundary
        Returns:
        Return the Eigenvalue from the major axis (computational expensive!)

      • getEigenvalueMinorAxis

        public double getEigenvalueMinorAxis()
        Calculates Eigenvalue from the minor axis using the moments of the boundary
        Returns:
        Return the Eigenvalue from the minor axis (computational expensive!)

      • getElongation

        public double getElongation()
        The Elongation of the Blob based on a fitted ellipse (1 - minor axis / major axis)
        Returns:
        The Elongation (normed between 0 and 1)

      • getOuterContour

        public java.awt.Polygon getOuterContour()
        The outer contour of an object (polygon points are pixel indicies)
        Returns:
        The outer contour of an object (polygon points are pixel indicies)

      • getOuterContourAsChainCode

        public int[] getOuterContourAsChainCode()
        Calculates the freeman chain code the outer contour
        Returns:
        The outer contour as freeman chain code

      • getInnerContours

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Polygon> getInnerContours()
        Return all inner contours (holes) of the blob.
        Returns:
        Arraylist of the inner contours.

      • getLabel

        public int getLabel()
        Return the label of the blob in the labeled image
        Returns:
        Return blob's label in the labeled image

      • getPerimeter

        public double getPerimeter()
        Calculates the perimeter of the outer contour using its chain code
        Returns:
        The perimeter of the outer contour.

      • getPerimeterConvexHull

        public double getPerimeterConvexHull()
        Calculates the perimeter of the convex hull
        Returns:
        The perimeter of the convex hull

      • getConvexHull

        public java.awt.Polygon getConvexHull()
        Returns the convex hull of the blob.
        Returns:
        The convex hull as polygon

      • getEnclosedArea

        public double getEnclosedArea()
        Calculates the enclosed are of the outer contour without subsctracting possible holes.
        Returns:
        The enclosed area of the outer contour (without substracting the holes).

      • getCircularity

        public double getCircularity()
        Calculates the circularity of the outer contour: (perimeter*perimeter) / (enclosed area). If the value approaches 0.0, it indicates that the polygon is increasingly elongated.
        Returns:
        Circularity (perimeter*perimeter) / (enclosed area)

      • getThinnesRatio

        public double getThinnesRatio()
        The Thinnes Ratio of the blob (normed). A circle has a thinnes ratio of 1.
        Returns:
        Thinnes Ratio defined as: (4*PI)/Circularity

      • getAreaToPerimeterRatio

        public double getAreaToPerimeterRatio()
        Area/Perimeter
        Returns:
        Area to perimeter ratio

      • getContourTemperature

        public double getContourTemperature()
        Calculates the Contour Temperatur. It has a strong relationship to the fractal dimension.
        Returns:
        Contour Temperatur
        See Also:
        in Luciano da Fontoura Costa, Roberto Marcondes Cesar, Jr.Shape Classification and Analysis: Theory and Practice, Second Edition, 2009, CRC Press

      • getFractalBoxDimension

        public double getFractalBoxDimension(int[] boxSizes)
        Box Dimension of the blob boundary.
        Parameters:
        boxSizes - ordered array of Box-Sizes
        Returns:
        Calculates the fractal box dimension of the blob.

      • getFractalBoxDimension

        public double getFractalBoxDimension()
        Returns:
        The fractal box dimension of the blob.

      • getFractalDimensionGoodness

        public double getFractalDimensionGoodness()
        The goodness of the "best fit" line of the fractal box dimension estimation.
        Returns:
        The goodness of the "best fit" line of the fractal box dimension estimation.

      • getNumberofHoles

        public int getNumberofHoles()
        The number of inner contours (Holes) of a blob.
        Returns:
        The number of inner contours (Holes) of a blob.
